title: Purse
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, carnelian? 
Technique: beaded crochet
description: Small sac of crocheted black silk with gilt beads, set within a gold rim with a lid ornamented with a wreath in relief, etched pattern, and a cameo of a head in profile carved in reddish stone. Find gold chain, single gold drop. Lined with green silk.
name: Purse
